home.content:
# NEOS: Interactivity
---

Hello, Wrold!

Welcome to Lecture 2 of **NEOS**. Today we will be talking about how to add interactivity to our webpages.

Be sure to hit me up on **[slack](https://neoschat.slack.com/messages/general/)** if you've any questions!

#### Main Goals
---

1. Review CSS selectors
2. Learn basics of programming
3. Add functional interactivity with jQuery

#### Game Plan
---

#### [Warmup](#warmup)
#### [CSS Review](#css-review)
#### [Responsive](#responsive)
#### [Programming Basics](#programming)
#### [jQuery Plugins](#jquery-plugins)
#### [Common UIs](#common-uis)
